mapper.select: SELECT exreview_id, exreview_name, exreview_writer, exreview_pass, exreview_hit, exreview_score, exreview_content, excart_id, exprod_name FROM mem_excart_exprod_exreview WHERE EXREVIEW_ID = #{exreviewId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

WITH ORDEREDEVENT AS ( SELECT exreview_id, exreview_name, exreview_writer, exreview_pass, exreview_hit, exreview_score, exreview_content, excart_id, exprod_name FROM mem_excart_exprod_exreview ORDER BY EXREVIEW_ID DESC ) SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, ORDEREDEVENT.* FROM ORDEREDEVENT )A WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
